mapper.insert: insert into note (noteNo, senderId, receiverId, noteTitle, noteContent, noteDate) values (gxgroup_seq.nextval, #{senderId}, #{receiverId}, #{noteTitle}, #{noteContent}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select count(*) from note where receiverId = #{receiverId}
